title: The provisions in UDCPR relating to balcony shall apply to the URS with the modification that there shall be no restriction on Zone and balcony shall not reduce marginal open space to less than 3
clause_text: The provisions in UDCPR relating to balcony shall apply to the URS with the modification that there shall be no restriction on Zone and balcony shall not reduce marginal open space to less than 3.0 m. However, at ground level, clear margin of minimum 4.5 m. shall be maintained. Enclosed balcony shall be included while calculating the entitled area.
section: Relaxation in Building and other requirements â€“
